titles.title: Criminal Justice Information Improvement Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets act of 1968 to assist States and local governments to improve the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of criminal justice information.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 6/29/1987--Introduced. Criminal Justice Information Improvement Act of 1987 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to establish a grant program to assist State and local governments to improve the accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of criminal justice information. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1988 through 1992.
